entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
